article.title: U.S. Navy Procures Microcircuitry for Trident II Guidance System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Charles Stark Draper Laboratories Incorporated, Cambridge, Massachusetts, is being awarded a more than $57 million firm-fixed-price, fixed-price-incentive contract for Trident II (D5) guidance system microcircuit wafers and strategic systems programs alteration repair equivalent units.Â The Navy Strategic Systems Programs, Arlington, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
